channel.title: Characterfile write error
channel.description:
Ok well i'm trying add a xmas event and i'm adding the variable as donat and it's not letting me add it idk what i'm doing wrong because i'm doing exactly the same thing i did with barrows and i didn't get any errors then idk if the arrow is showing right but it should be at the d on donat on both of them and i change the word and always get the same error.
I'm using deltascape.
[code]client.java:17732: cannot find symbol symbol : variable donat location: class client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donat), 0, Integer.toString(donat).length()); ^ client.java:17732: cannot find symbol symbol : variable donat location: class client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donat), 0, Integer.toString(donat).length()); ^ Note: EconomyBoost.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Characterfile write error
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Thank you rich i love joo

item.title: Characterfile write error
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Ok well where do i declare the variable donat?

Read full topic

item.title: Characterfile write error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You haven’t declared the variable donat.
Also, using write(String, int, int) is pointless since you are writing the entire String.
Just use characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donat));

Read full topic
